title: Kyiv urges EU to extend food trade benefits until year’s end to prevent pre-war scenario
summary: The European Commission has repeatedly signalled that it does not plan to extend the ATMs again, as the negotiations on the agricultural part were the most difficult.

title: Can Europe Replace American Support for Ukraine? Here’s What to Know
summary:
The European Union consists of dozens of member states—and although there is a broad alignment in pro-Ukraine sentiment, decisions to aid Kyiv are bound to be rife with national considerations.

title: Russia’s Complicated Strategic Frontiers in Southeast Asia
summary: Southeast Asia is an especially appealing strategic frontier in Moscow’s dream of a multipolar world. But the reality of Russian engagement in the region is complicated.

title: The Kramatorsk aquarium: A calm oasis on Ukraine front
